actions.description: The abishai makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Longsword attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword

name: White Abishai [MoM]
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

specialTraits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.
specialTraits.name: Devil's Sight

specialTraits.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.
specialTraits.name: Reckless
